Muhammad Ali

"Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee."

  • 1942: Muhammad Ali was born.
  • 1954: Muhammad Ali boxing debut
  • 1964: Fight against Liston for the World heavyweight champion title
  • 1966: Refused to be inducted in the armed forces.
  • 1971: Fight of the Century against Joe Frazier
  • 2016: Muhammad Ali died.
More info on Muhammad Ali
